Stay Informed
Permits / Forms
Community Projects

  1. Waukesha County North Avenue Reconstruction

    Waukesha County is in the process of reconstructing North Avenue between Calhoun Rd and 124th St. Construction of the project is planned for 2020 & 2021. A public hearing has been scheduled for January 9th, 2019 from 4:30 P.M. - 8:00 P.M. at Brookfield Central High School Cafeteria. Access up-to-date information on the Waukesha County North Avenue Reconstruction Study webpage.

  2. GIS (Geographic Information System) Available for Village of Elm Grove

    Have you ever wondered what your house looks like from an aerial perspective? Or what kind of tree is growing in the Village right-of-way in front of your home? You can find answers to these questions by using the Village GIS mapping platform. Click on the link below to being exploring the user friendly Village GIS system. Once you land on the external GIS portal page, click on the "map" icon to access the Public Map.

  3. Village Park Splash Pad Project

    We are looking to make a splash in Village Park with the addition of a splash pad. Want to see the latest on this fun project? Look no further! Your donation (large or small) can help make this happen!

  4. Downtown Master Plan Update

    Milestones are being set! Click here to view updates and progress reports related to the Downtown Master Plan. Short Elliott Hendrickson Inc (SEH) has been selected to collaboratively work with Village staff, elected officials and residents to enhance the downtown and the community.

  5. Underwood Creek Floodplain Restoration & Stormwater Infiltration Project

    The Village is requesting proposals for the restoration project. Bid information is available.

  6. Underwood Creek Downtown Daylighting Project

    Conceptual drawing of the daylighting of the Underwood Creek.
